data.Sentence_cn: 读完一篇题为《吸烟与健康》的文章之后，我点上了一枝香烟，来镇定一下自己紧张的神经。
data.Sentence: After reading an article entitled 'Cigarette Smoking and Your Health' I lit a cigarette to calm my nerves.

data.Sentence_cn: 我聚精会神而又愉快地吸着这枝烟。因为我确信这是我最后一枝烟了。
data.Sentence: I smoked with concentration and pleasure as I was sure that this would be my last cigarette.

data.Sentence_cn: 整整一个星期我根本没有吸烟。在此期间，我妻子吃尽了苦头。
data.Sentence: For a whole week I did not smoke at all and during this time, my wife suffered terribly.

data.Sentence_cn: 我具备了戒烟者通常表现出来的所有症状：脾气暴躁和食欲旺盛。
data.Sentence: I had all the usual symptoms of someone giving up smoking: a bad temper and an enormous appetite.

data.Sentence_cn: 我的朋友们不断地向我递香烟和雪茄。
data.Sentence: My friends kept on offering me cigarettes and cigars.

data.Sentence_cn: 每当我从口袋里掏出一包糖果时，他们都毫不掩饰地表现出他们对此感到非常好笑。
data.Sentence: They made no effort to hide their amusement whenever I produced a packet of sweets from my pocket.

data.Sentence_cn: 这样过了7天以后，我去参加一次聚会。
data.Sentence: After seven days of this I went to a party.

data.Sentence_cn: 我周围的每个人都在吸烟，我感到非常不自在。
data.Sentence: Everybody around me was smoking and I felt extremely uncomfortable.

data.Sentence_cn: 当我的老朋友布赖恩极力劝我接受一枝香烟时，我再也忍不住了。
data.Sentence: When my old friend Brian urged me to accept a cigarette, it was more than I could bear.

data.Sentence_cn: 我内疚地接过一枝点上，心满意足地抽起来。
data.Sentence: I took one guiltily, lit it and smoked with satisfaction.

data.Sentence_cn: 一切又都恢复了正常，为此我妻子十分高兴。
data.Sentence: My wife was delighted that things had returned to normal once more.

data.Sentence_cn: 不管怎么说，正如布赖恩指出的那样，戒烟是世界上最容易的事情，
data.Sentence: Anyway, as Brian pointed out, it is the easiest thing in the world to give up smoking.

data.Sentence_cn: 他自己就已戒了很多次了！
data.Sentence: He himself has done it lots of times!
